tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Man of few words.spot on diagnosing my problem and explaining the whole report for me to appreciate better.Mere talking to him brought down my anxiety levels and I felt so relieved.Thank you doctor for saving me and giving me a new life.I haven't seen God but for me you are the one.May the almighty bless more of all his showerings and best wishes for you.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I felt breathing problem after next day of covid second shot.
Reached hospital emergency in time but went into coma within 
one hour. He done stenting after consulting team and my family/
I  came out of coma after five days. Thanks to  his and team efforts.
I strongly recommend him.

review: Doctor was ok, wait time was less, however the ambulance service is little expensive, 1100 for 5 km that's too much

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: I had undergone angiography and stent implantation during 2006. Procedure done by Dr. Shyam Sundar. Since then I have been visiting him twice annually for regular check up . I find him very friendly towards patients. A simple person with lot of care and love towards his patients. Slowly hears the patient's problems and comes out with good medications.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: ****** **** ****** *********** * ******** ******** *** **** The doctor could guide patient or its designate on how to take medicines like before food or after food and number of days the medicine needs to be taken. Ambience is not great. Lots of mosquitos.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Had appointments on 2 days in the week. On one of the days, doctor was on time and on the other day, doctor arrived more than 30 mins late. Doctor did a preliminary health check on BP, physical examination and then sent us for blood test, echo and TMT. Reports were quickly obtained and doctor gave his diagnosis quickly. His experience makes *** ********* ********, quick and to the point.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review:
Waiting period for TMT or echo cardiogram ma be reduced.
While technicians at TMT or echo cardiogram are very friendly, process of seeking prior appointment at least one day in advance may be introduced,instead of taking appointment on the same day.
